title: Chains of Freedom
description: Kaihaitu has been trained for leadership since she was a small child but nothing quite prepared her for the arrival of the British Redcoats. When they build their new fort right by the Maori fishing grounds and refuse to allow access to the Maori people there are very few options for Kai to take.With her father dead and other villagers sick she has to make a choice between her heart and her head.
author: Jess Mountifield
